Carbon Architecture Ltd.
165A High Street
Middlesex TW12 1NL
Dear Sir/Madam,
I am writing to apply for the position of Energy & Process Improvement Engineer. I am currently a sustainability advisor within the food manufacturing industry and I am seeking a new challenge with a wider scope of work in different sectors.
I would like to work for Carbon Architecture as I would be excited to contribute to the continued growth of an expanding business working towards sustainability. In addition, the company has a range of projects on waste minimisation and energy reduction that are of great interest to me.
I believe that due to my knowledge and skillset are well suited to the role  Krissy Polo-Tolley

30 March 2021

Dear Sir/Madam,
I am writing to apply for the position of Energy & Process Improvement Engineer. I am currently a sustainability advisor within the food manufacturing industry and I am seeking a new challenge with a wider scope of work in different sectors.
I would like to work for Carbon Architecture as I would be excited to contribute to the continued growth of an expanding business working towards sustainability. In addition, the company has a range of projects on waste minimisation and energy reduction that are of great interest to me.
I believe that due to my knowledge and skillset are well suited to the role applied of Energy & Process Improvement Engineer.
I would like to thank you in advance for considering my application and look forward to hearing from you.
Yours faithfully
Krissy Polo-Tolley
